text: Polygon Pictures is a Japanese 3DCG animation studio. It was founded in 1983. animated a wide variety of content, from commercials for Shiseido featuring the studio's original penguin characters Rocky & Hopper, to the 3D CG anime television series Digital Tokoro-san and the 3DCG anime film Samuroid Zero. Category:Japanese animation studios Category:Japanese movie studios Category:Companies based in Tokyo
title: Polygon Pictures
